summary.title: Developer
summary.text: I am a full stack developer working either on front/back or API/SDK project, mainly focused on Node.Js, HTML5, C#, JAVA, I'm also programing in C/C++ during my free time as to when I'm working as a freelance as a game porting developer.

value: During my journey, I have been able to:
- Design and implement business tools that facilitate the creation of forms, optimize formatting, and manage electronic signature dispatch.
- Take over and enhance a mobile/desktop application project by adding new features, correcting bugs, and ensuring its deployment on the Microsoft Store.
- Develop a business tool for a mutual insurance/providence service, including a calculation engine for quotes and the integration of an electronic signature system.
- Serve as a project manager, guiding integration decisions, taking charge of the specifications, and making estimates for tender calls.
- Train a team to ensure a smooth transition of a project to regular operations.
Significant Projects:
Electronic Signature Business Tool
Technology: Cordova, JS/HTML, C#
Roles: Developer, Deployment Manager
Calculation Engine for Mutual Insurance/Providence
Technology: AngularJS, JAVA, NodeJS, SQL
Roles: Developer, Project Manager
Middleware and API for ISV Clients
Technology: Node.js, Axios, Bash
Roles: Backend Developer
Billing Manager and API for Electronic Signature
Technology: Docker, Portainer, SQL, JAVA, Spring, Angular, Bash
Roles: Full Stack Developer, Deployment Manager
Legal Archiving Connector and Cloud Storage
Technology: JAVA, Spring, JPA, Retrofit
Roles: Backend Developer

array.title: Internship as web developer (front-end)/(back-end) / developer C/C++ arduino

description.value: Internship as web developer in Javascript(vanilla ES6) and PHP, introducing people to the world of informatics and education programming with Arduino and C/C++.
Internship in the maintenance of computer equipment for medical clients and installation of medical management software (axilog).
